channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
When the TTC replaces the Scarborough RT, can, I dunno, can I have it? I know it‚Äôd be a lot of work to take care of, but, I dunno, I kind of want it. https://t.co/N9ZnibOnEr
What if, and hear me out on this, how about instead of demolishing the whole thing, we keep the section between Lawrence East and Scarborough Centre (or, let‚Äôs say, Midland), and the TTC just gives it to me. I‚Äôll automate the system and maintain it. Deal? https://t.co/XD3IWUrgrG
Uh, assuming I don‚Äôt take on any of its debt. And after I crowdfund millions of dollars for keeping that part of the system up. And set up a charitable foundation to keep it funded.

@hankgreen I‚Äôll unfollow someone if their last [x] amount of tweets are about a subject that‚Äôs wearing me out. Hopefully someone will RT them into my stream. I‚Äôll unfollow mean people that I don‚Äôt learn anything from. That said, because you‚Äôre mean isn‚Äôt a sufficient reason to unfollow.
I ran my washing machine, dishwasher, and the self-cleaning function of my oven all at the same time tonight, if you know what I mean.

Today‚Äôs my name day in Czechia, Slovakia, France, and Hungary!
A reminder: I created a Twitter community for people named Richard. https://t.co/YrDuzHM5La

I‚Äôm at the highly scripted campaign launch for the Ontario branch of Canada‚Äôs orange-branded political party. https://t.co/7pnywpp1YF
I‚Äôm not the only greying white guy who came here alone on transit. I‚Äôm keeping an eye on him, though that makes me wonder: Who‚Äôs keeping an eye on me?
He did the same thing I was doing there, which was not much. Just there to listen, as far as I could tell.
Events should have an ‚Äúonlies‚Äù section so we can know who else is there and not waiting for someone to join them and whom it‚Äôs OK to try to make friends with.
A week today: I run in the Under Armour Spring Run-Off, my first race in two and a half years. #UASpringRunOff @RunCRS (Apr. 9) https://t.co/54gKCtgZEd
@CatherineOmega https://t.co/ABEwovqO81

This might be the last Duke-UNC game I watch as a fan of the Blue Devils. The Coach K era is over after this year, and so with it, the end of an era of cheering for an NCAA basketball team.
Back-and-forth basketball. I couldn‚Äôt ask for anything more.
They‚Äôre a 20-minute drive from each other. https://t.co/mI4z8nMyA4
Wild game. Hold on to your butts.
Standing up for the last minute.
Great game. Great finish.

@toddsieling I forget the account, but there was someone who was watching the #nofilter hashtag on Instagram for photos that were actually run through a filter and pointing out which filter they used. I wonder if that‚Äôs possible in this case.
@CanadaPaintings @vantransient üëÜüèªüëÜüèª
‚ÄúExciting‚Äù is not the word I‚Äôd use for this Meetup group. https://t.co/8fFRLjJ63X

I stayed at a hostel in San Francisco in 2010 and when I checked in, the attendants drew lines on a map around the area of the Tenderloin and said ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt go inside this triangle.‚Äù I did, and it was fine. https://t.co/rgqtEtfF6A
Tonight. https://t.co/rtAqvL4jqL

This is actually a good idea. Clubhouse has a quiet reading room, where it‚Äôs literally just an hour of people reading quietly. You sort of feel like you‚Äôre doing it ‚Äúwith‚Äù people because you know they‚Äôre doing the same thing as you. https://t.co/mMRkqZpnKY
@heyrickie I took the whole day off, just in case it changes between now and then.
Of what year? https://t.co/NlhFLzN2Jt
More like Group LFG! https://t.co/kFjXqZ45Fy
@dlbno I was hoping for Group Haych, too.
Congratulations to the Canadian Men‚Äôs Soccer Team in winning the right to lose to Belgium in FIFA World Cup!
https://t.co/0JWU2g7NDn https://t.co/4ZejwF1Boq
@pvieito Yessssssss. https://t.co/qIY7jAIhnG
It Always Snows in April. #dlws
